definition: to herd/to breed livestock/to govern (old)/government official (old)

sentences.english: You will have all the oats and hay you want.
sentences.chinese: 你将得到你想要的燕麦和牧草。

sentences.english: Ruminal microbes play a major role in the degradation of forage cell walls in the rumen.
sentences.chinese: 牧草细胞壁在瘤胃内降解主要是瘤胃微生物起作用。

sentences.english: Th is region is clothed with luxuriant herbage in summer.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天，这地区覆盖著绿茸茸的牧草。

sentences.english: Naw an extensive list of linkage maps have been dvafted.
sentences.chinese: 目前，一定数量牧草的遗传连锁图谱已经产生。

sentences.english: To provide ruminant animal an excellent herding ground with hay or sports field.
sentences.chinese: 提供反刍动物良好之牧草地或运动场。

sentences.english: The feeding value of forages is influenced by many factors.
sentences.chinese: 牧草的饲用价值受许多因素的影响。

sentences.english: In growing season of grass, the chart of seasonal water in soil appeared two peak, and three valley.
sentences.chinese: 旬土壤水分含量在牧草生长期呈两峰三谷型。

sentences.english: He looked over at the field where the cows were grazing.
sentences.chinese: 他往四周看了看，看到牛群正在牧草。

sentences.english: We have tiny little vipers that live underground in some of the pasturelands.
sentences.chinese: 在一些牧草地下有一些讨厌的小毒蛇就住在蛇洞里。

sentences.english: These perennial forage can effectively control soil erosion and debility of soil nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 这些多年生牧草能有效地控制土壤侵蚀和养分亏损。

sentences.english: The wild leguminous forage germplasm resources in rangeland of north part of Chifeng were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 对赤峰北部野生豆科牧草种质资源进行了调查研究。

sentences.english: A proportion of the paddocks can be withdrawn for mowing.
sentences.chinese: 可以抽出一定比例的地块供收割牧草用。

sentences.english: The farmers plan to lay the corn fields down to grass.
sentences.chinese: 农场主们打算将玉米田改种牧草。

sentences.english: Test of introduced 6 varities of Pennisetum was conducted in Doumen area of Zhuhai city.
sentences.chinese: 对6个狼尾草属牧草在珠海市斗门区进行引种试验。

sentences.english: Why is common herd's grass also called timothy grass?
sentences.chinese: 为什么常见的猫尾草也叫梯牧草？

sentences.english: The utilization mode of hay and grass power.
sentences.chinese: 牧草调制干草和加工草粉利用模式。

definition: to forage/to gather for eating/to pick and eat
highland barley (grown in Tibet and Qinghai)/qingke barley
water plants/habitat with water source and grass
